  • May 7, 2011

    123/365

    My King of Limbs newspaper album arrived on Tuesday.

    In other news, I've recently remembered how much I like Silent Alarm by Bloc Party. It's a bit too long, but when it's good, it's fantastic. Especially the drums.

  • May 4, 2011

    122/365

    Went to Ragley Hall for a picnic, only to find ourselves in the middle of a pro-hunting fair. Great.

  • May 3, 2011

    121/365: Puppy

    On Sunday we met Tilly, Steph's sister's new cavapoo puppy.

    In case you hadn't noticed, she's a very sleepy dog. We were only there for about an hour and she fell asleep on 4 separate occasions. Not that I have anything to compare that to, for all I know that's normal for 9-week-old puppies.

  • Apr 30, 2011

    120/365: The Fly II

    At first I thought it might be cheating to have 2 photos in a row of the same thing, but then I remembered that I make the rules for this 365, and it's not.

  • Apr 30, 2011

    119/365: Fly

    Got very lucky with this one; Steph and I were out for a quick walk and she just happened to notice it. I didn't have much time to think so I just took it and luckily it came out pretty well. Wish I could have got a bit closer but I was worried it would fly away.

    Lemme know what you think...

    115/365: Witley Court

    I was a little hung over, which is probably why I decided to take most of these from a seated or reclining position.

  • Apr 26, 2011

    114/365: Photowalk with Jasper

    Spent Sunday afternoon with Jasper on a photowalk around some of the less trodden parts of Birmingham. He knows loads about photography and it was great to talk about that stuff and get advice from him. He's also really good at spotting cool photo opportunities, which you'll notice if you read his blog. Which you should.

    As is the norm when I post more than one, the top one is my photo of the day. I'm quite pleased with them all, but I chose that one because I think it'll look the best as a thumbnail next to the rest of them.

    Have you subscribed to Jasper's RSS feed yet? Why the fuck not?
